document.full_text: for a second time in three years, britain's ross fisher has vaulted into contention at a major amid concerns over his pregnant wife, but on this occasion at the masters he hopes for a better golfing result.
document.title: fisher shrugs off birth pangs to thrive at augusta
lines_and_colors: for a second time in three years, britain's ross fisher has vaulted into contention at a major amid concerns over his pregnant wife, but on this occasion at the masters he hopes for a better golfing result.
